desc: 70% boost to Atk and max HP of Female types, considerably boosts Atk relative to how high remaining HP is, lowers Atk relative to how low remaining HP is, greatly boosts elemental damage, 100% boost to Atk, Def for first 4 turns & raises Atk parameter limits to 150000

dictionary.lore: Baiken's iconic glass mono-goggle. Worn over her missing eye, it adds more flare to her unique image. It does not boast the same offensive powers as her arsenal of "Demon Tools," but it has been with her through thick and thin since the aftermath of the Crusades.

name: Baikenâ€™s Mono-goggle
